body_html:
I'm no expert but I beleive API 19 would of been used on a older version of Android SDK this is what my workspace file looked like.

android_sdk_repository(
name = "androidsdk",
api_level = 24,
build_tools_version = "24.0.0",
path = "YOURPATH")

android_ndk_repository(
name="androidndk",
path="YOURPATH/android-ndk-r12b",
api_level=21)

Maybe try that? If you could also mention what Operating System and what versions of the Android SDK & NDK you are trying to use and copy and paste what your WORKSPACE file looks like compared to what I pasted I imagine that could be helpful.

body:
I'm no expert but I beleive API 19 would of been used on a older version of Android SDK this is what my workspace file looked like.

> android_sdk_repository(
>     name = "androidsdk",
>     api_level = 24,
>     build_tools_version = "24.0.0",
>     path = "YOURPATH")
> 
> android_ndk_repository(
>     name="androidndk",
>     path="YOURPATH/android-ndk-r12b",
>     api_level=21)

Maybe try that?  If you could also mention what Operating System and what versions of the Android SDK & NDK you are trying to use and copy and paste what your WORKSPACE file looks like compared to what I pasted I imagine that could be helpful.
